title: Can we get Star Guardian video with Youtubes "Optimizations"?
body:
So youtube optimizes videos and stuff for a smaller file size and etc.

i was hoping if we could get this video
 [https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=oorajmbSJUM](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=oorajmbSJUM)
without the optimizations, so we/i can take screenshots without huge blurryness like in this 
 [http://i.imgur.com/xlJjIuc](http://i.imgur.com/xlJjIuc.jpg)

or perhaps even a higher res version, as uploading that to youtube helps a bit too (or post a higher rez here too)
